title: Watchy Watch Faces
summary: Create amazing watch faces in seconds. Watchy has many features and easy to use.
description: It has never been easier to create custom watch faces. Watchy Watch Faces is intuitive and easy to use and has many features. So everyone will find it easy to create beautiful watch faces. Also low power consumption was in our mind from the start and we hope you will be more than satisfied with your watch battery life when Watchy is running on your watch. You can customize every part of your watch face.Watchy works on all Android Wear devices from different manufacturers (round and square).Features:- Easy to use interface- Background: select different backgrounds or select your own color. Add different effects over selected background.- Text: Write custom text and place it on your watch face. Select font type, color, size and position- Image: add custom image from your phone. It is possible to crop image, resize image and position image- Numbers: Font type, font size, font color and font position can be chosen- Markers: Select diferent marker types, change marker color and position- Watch hands: select different watch hands, change their color and select sweeping/smooth second hand- Dials/Widgets: select among day, mont, month&date, battery, seconds, 12 hour time, 24 hour time, UTC time and LCD widgets. You can change font color, background color, border color.- Low battery usage when Watchy Watch Face is selected as watch- Name your watch face, vibrate every hour, vibrate when watch is connected/disconnected from device, vibrate when watch is chargedIn-app purchases- Mixed fonts pack. For ca $1.1 you get more than 40 different fonts.- Cool backgorunds pack. Here you get cool backgrounds for ca $1.Watchy works with Android Wear watches and currently it supports the following watches :- LG G Watch R- Sony Smartwatch 3- LG G Watch- Samsung Gear Live- Motorola Moto 360- Asus ZenWatchSometimes it takes minute or two after app install to activate watch face .
descriptionHTML:
It has never been easier to create custom watch faces. Watchy Watch Faces is intuitive and easy to use and has many features. So everyone will find it easy to create beautiful watch faces. Also low power consumption was in our mind from the start and we hope you will be more than satisfied with your watch battery life when Watchy is running on your watch. You can customize every part of your watch face.

Watchy works on all Android Wear devices from different manufacturers (round and square).

Features:

- Easy to use interface
- Background: select different backgrounds or select your own color. Add different effects over selected background.
- Text: Write custom text and place it on your watch face. Select font type, color, size and position
- Image: add custom image from your phone. It is possible to crop image, resize image and position image
- Numbers: Font type, font size, font color and font position can be chosen
- Markers: Select diferent marker types, change marker color and position
- Watch hands: select different watch hands, change their color and select sweeping/smooth second hand
- Dials/Widgets: select among day, mont, month&date, battery, seconds, 12 hour time, 24 hour time, UTC time and
LCD widgets. You can change font color, background color, border color.
- Low battery usage when Watchy Watch Face is selected as watch
- Name your watch face, vibrate every hour, vibrate when watch is connected/disconnected from device, vibrate when watch is charged

In-app purchases
- Mixed fonts pack. For ca $1.1 you get more than 40 different fonts.
- Cool backgorunds pack. Here you get cool backgrounds for ca $1.

Watchy works with Android Wear watches and currently it supports the following watches :
- LG G Watch R
- Sony Smartwatch 3
- LG G Watch
- Samsung Gear Live
- Motorola Moto 360
- Asus ZenWatch

Sometimes it takes minute or two after app install to activate watch face .
comments: Great app and highly customize watch face, just minor bug widget text not show up on LG G watch
Can't understand. Doesn't work on my Motor 360 nor on my LG Urbane.
Amazing Easy to use and has everything I need.
